thread.title: Women go into meltdown over pubic hair revelation
thread.title_full: Women go into meltdown over pubic hair revelation

title: Women go into meltdown over pubic hair revelation
text: Share this article Share Several women confirmed the phenomenon, but bemoaned the fact that they now have hair sprouting in unexpected places instead, such as on their toes and chins. One woman claimed she found a chin hair so long that it rivalled the ones on her head and couldn't understand why nobody had warned her about it. After having the phenomenon confirmed, people were eager to know if it's a gradual process or if they can expect it to happen all at once Many people were curious as to why the same thing doesn't happen with armpit or leg hair. Meanwhile, others were keen to know how the process takes place - whether it's a gradual loss or happens all in one go while shopping at Asda, as one person suggested. One woman cautioned that when the hair does disappear, you'll discover that what lies beneath has changed in appearance too. Some people warned of other unwanted shocks that come with a loss of pubic hair Women warned that while hair 'down there' may diminish, it can start springing up in other places you don't want it to Read more: Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
